short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Augment your tab workflow with extended tab, tab group and session managment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions boosts your browsing productivity in two main ways: 
- By providing you with a great interface to manage your tabs and tab groups efficiently.
- By allowing you to save sets of tabs and tab groups as sessions that you can easily switch back and forth between.

It also provides other useful features that make your workflow more convenient, such as useful keyboard shortcuts for certain commonly performed actions and importing tab groups from other sessions.

This extension will remain free for everyone forever. If you enjoy using it and can afford to, please consider buying me a coffee here:
https://paglobal.online/pages/posts/donations.html

The following projects either inspired this extension or tremendously helped in its development:
- Lit(https://lit.dev/)
- Shoelace(https://shoelace.style/)
- Pragmatic drag and drop(https://atlassian.design/components/pragmatic-drag-and-drop/about)
- Fuzzysort(https://github.com/farzher/fuzzysort)
- PromethiumJS(https://promethium.js.org/)
- Arc Browser(https://arc.net/)
